name: redcap_cypress
description: This repository is a template to assist you in writing **automated tests for REDCap**.

scripts.clean: npm install && del-cli node_modules/redcap_rsvc redcap_rsvc package-lock.json
scripts.redcap_rsvc:install: npm run clean && npm install && move-cli node_modules/redcap_rsvc ./redcap_rsvc
scripts.redcap_rsvc:prepare_run: npm run redcap_rsvc:install && npm run redcap_rsvc:move_files
scripts.redcap_rsvc:validate_features: npm install gherkin-parse glob-fs --no-save --silent --ignore-scripts && node validate_feature_files.js
scripts.rctf:test_server: npm install http-server --no-save --silent && npx http-server node_modules/rctf/tests/static/ -p 6060 &

author: Adam De Fouw
